title: Will Trump Spill Secrets As Ex-Prez? Mt. Dew Brisket 11.11.20
itunes:title: Will Trump Spill Secrets As Ex-Prez? Mt. Dew Brisket 11.11.20
description:
In episode 757, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and Grown Local co-host Billy Wayne Davis to discuss Trump becoming Gossip Girl after this with our country's secrets, more voter fraud fixations by the right, what's going on with Republicans in Georgia, the dead people and pets voting conspiracy theory, the Mountain Dew cookbook, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Officials fear Trump could reveal secrets
  2. Trump’s AZ Election Fraud Lawsuit Fixates On Grand Total Of 180 Votes, According To Attorney
  3. DOJ Head Of Election Crimes Branch Resigns After Barr Allows Baseless Voter Fraud Probes
  4. Mike Pompeo was not joking
  5. NEWS: GA Senators @sendavidperdue + @SenatorLoeffler call on Georgia’s Secretary of State (a fellow Republican) to resign.
  6. Claims that dead people voted went viral. These are the facts
  7. Thin Allegations of ‘Dead People’ Voting
  8. No, 1.8 million dead people aren’t going to vote in November
  9. The Dog That Voted and Other Election Fraud Yarns
  10. The Republican Approach to Voter Fraud: Lie
  11. Deceased cat gets voter registration application in mail
  12. MTN DEW announces first cookbook, world will be utterly changed
  13. WATCH: El Michels Affair - Villa

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
